verses.verse: And<WG2532> there appeared<WG3700> a great<WG3173> wonder<WG4592> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>; a woman<WG1135> clothed<WG4016> with the sun<WG2246>, and<WG2532> the moon<WG4582> under<WG5270> her<WG846> feet<WG4228>, and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> her<WG846> head<WG2776> a crown<WG4735> of twelve<WG1427> stars<WG792>:
And<WG2532> she being<WG2192> with<WG1722> child<WG1064> cried<WG2896>, travailing in birth<WG5605>, and<WG2532> pained<WG928> to be delivered<WG5088>.

And<WG2532> there appeared<WG3700> another<WG243> wonder<WG4592> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>; and<WG2532> behold<WG2400> a great<WG3173> red<WG4450> dragon<WG1404>, having<WG2192> seven<WG2033> heads<WG2776> and<WG2532> ten<WG1176> horns<WG2768>, and<WG2532> seven<WG2033> crowns<WG1238> upon<WG1909> his<WG846> heads<WG2776>.

And<WG2532> his<WG846> tail<WG3769> drew<WG4951> the third part<WG5154> of the stars<WG792> of heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> did cast<WG906> them<WG846> to<WG1519> the earth<WG1093>: and<WG2532> the dragon<WG1404> stood<WG2476> before<WG1799> the woman<WG1135> which<WG3588> was ready<WG3195> to be delivered<WG5088>, for<WG2443> to devour<WG2719> her<WG846> child<WG5043> as soon as<WG3752> it was born<WG5088>.

And<WG2532> she brought forth<WG5088> a man<WG730> child<WG5207>, who<WG3739> was<WG3195> to rule<WG4165> all<WG3956> nations<WG1484> with<WG1722> a rod<WG4464> of iron<WG4603>: and<WG2532> her<WG846> child<WG5043> was caught up<WG726> unto<WG4314> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> to his<WG846> throne<WG2362>.

And<WG2532> the woman<WG1135> fled<WG5343> into<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048>, where<WG3699> she hath<WG2192> a place<WG5117> prepared<WG2090> of<WG575> God<WG2316>, that<WG2443> they should feed<WG5142> her<WG846> there<WG1563> a thousand<WG5507> two hundred<WG1250> and threescore<WG1835> days<WG2250>.

And<WG2532> there was<WG1096> war<WG4171> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>: Michael<WG3413> and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32> fought<WG4170> against<WG2596> the dragon<WG1404>; and<WG2532> the dragon<WG1404> fought<WG4170> and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32>,
And<WG2532> prevailed<WG2480> not<WG3756>; neither<WG3777> was<WG2147> their<WG846> place<WG5117> found<WG2147> any more<WG2089> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>.

And<WG2532> the great<WG3173> dragon<WG1404> was cast out<WG906>, that old<WG744> serpent<WG3789>, called<WG2564> the Devil<WG1228>, and<WG2532> Satan<WG4567>, which<WG3588> deceiveth<WG4105> the whole<WG3650> world<WG3625>: he was cast out<WG906> into<WG1519> the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32> were cast out<WG906> with<WG3326> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> I heard<WG191> a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> saying<WG3004> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, Now<WG737> is come<WG1096> salvation<WG4991>, and<WG2532> strength<WG1411>, and<WG2532> the kingdom<WG932> of our<WG2257> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> the power<WG1849> of his<WG846> Christ<WG5547>: for<WG3754> the accuser<WG2723> of our<WG2257> brethren<WG80> is cast down<WG2598>, which<WG3588> accused<WG2725> them<WG846> before<WG1799> our<WG2257> God<WG2316> day<WG2250> and<WG2532> night<WG3571>.

And<WG2532> they<WG846> overcame<WG3528> him<WG846> by<WG1223> the blood<WG129> of the Lamb<WG721>, and<WG2532> by<WG1223> the word<WG3056> of their<WG846> testimony<WG3141>; and<WG2532> they loved<WG25> not<WG3756> their<WG846> lives<WG5590> unto<WG891> the death<WG2288>.

Therefore<WG1223><WG5124> rejoice<WG2165>, ye heavens<WG3772>, and<WG2532> ye that dwell<WG4637> in<WG1722> them<WG846>. Woe<WG3759> to the inhabiters<WG2730> of the earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> of the sea<WG2281>! for<WG3754> the devil<WG1228> is come down<WG2597> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209>, having<WG2192> great<WG3173> wrath<WG2372>, because he knoweth<WG1492> that<WG3754> he hath<WG2192> but a short<WG3641> time<WG2540>.

And<WG2532> when<WG3753> the dragon<WG1404> saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> he was cast<WG906> unto<WG1519> the earth<WG1093>, he persecuted<WG1377> the woman<WG1135> which<WG3748> brought forth<WG5088> the man<WG730> child.

And<WG2532> to the woman<WG1135> were given<WG1325> two<WG1417> wings<WG4420> of a great<WG3173> eagle<WG105>, that<WG2443> she might fly<WG4072> into<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048>, into<WG1519> her<WG846> place<WG5117>, where<WG3699> she is nourished<WG5142> for a time<WG1563><WG2540>, and<WG2532> times<WG2540>, and<WG2532> half<WG2255> a time<WG2540>, from<WG575> the face<WG4383> of the serpent<WG3789>.

And<WG2532> the serpent<WG3789> cast<WG906> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> water<WG5204> as<WG5613> a flood<WG4215> after<WG3694> the woman<WG1135>, that<WG2443> he might cause<WG4160> her<WG5026> to be carried away of the flood<WG4216>.

And<WG2532> the earth<WG1093> helped<WG997> the woman<WG1135>, and<WG2532> the earth<WG1093> opened<WG455> her<WG846> mouth<WG4750>, and<WG2532> swallowed up<WG2666> the flood<WG4215> which<WG3739> the dragon<WG1404> cast<WG906> out of<WG1537> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750>.

And<WG2532> the dragon<WG1404> was wroth<WG3710> with<WG1909> the woman<WG1135>, and<WG2532> went<WG565> to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> with<WG3326> the remnant<WG3062> of her<WG846> seed<WG4690>, which<WG3588> keep<WG5083> the commandments<WG1785> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> have<WG2192> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.
